long_description: The Oakley Jupiter Squared polarized sunglasses resist flash and show to bring you an original and solid pair of shades with the optical precision and performance you expect. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Nylon frames are lightweight, stress resistant and flexible for long-term wear. Optically correct, shatterproof and scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses enhance durability. Unique 3-point fit from Oakley includes optical alignment for sharp accurate vision, impact absorption for improved safety and geometry that extends the peripheral view. High Definition Optics(R) technology from Oakley maximizes your vision while retaining clarity, refraction and prism at all angles. Matte black frames feature Black Iridium polarized lenses for reduced glare and true color perception in extremely bright light. Woodgrain frames feature tungsten Iridium polarized lenses for reduced glare and sharpened visual acuity in medium to bright light. Oakley Jupiter Squared polarized sunglasses feature 6 base lens curvature for solid peripheral view and side coverage.
short_description: The Oakley Jupiter Squared polarized sunglasses resist flash and show to bring you an original and solid pair of shades with the optical precision and performance you expect.
